conbody.p: The cp command copies files and directories. For more information about using the cp command, search http://www.freebsd.org/cgi/man.cgi by specifying cp as the search keyword and by selecting the FreeBSD 6.2-Release option from the release list.
The following options are not supported by the Symbian version of the cp command:
The following options of the cp command work differently on Symbian platform.

li.p: -p: This option is used to copy and preserve the time stamp of a file.
-R: This option operates on the contents of directories recursively.

section.title: Copyright information
section.p: For information about documentation copyrights associated with the cp command, see http://www.freebsd.org/copyright/freebsd-doc-license.html.
